2628	
2629	def _parse_multi_options(options, split_token=','):
2630	    r"""Split and strip and discard empties.
2631	
2632	    Turns the following:
2633	
2634	    A,
2635	    B,
2636	
2637	    into ["A", "B"]
2638	    """
2639	    if options:
2640	        return [o.strip() for o in options.split(split_token) if o.strip()]
2641	    else:
2642	        return options

2743	def _parse_multi_options(options, split_token=","):
2744	    r"""Split and strip and discard empties.
2745	
2746	    Turns the following:
2747	
2748	    A,
2749	    B,
2750	
2751	    into ["A", "B"]
2752	    """
2753	    if options:
2754	        return [o.strip() for o in options.split(split_token) if o.strip()]
2755	    else:
2756	        return options
